data.eml:eml: Revision of the Siobla metallica group (Hymenoptera: Tenthredinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Niu, Gengyun, Wei, Meicai, Taeger, Andreas (2012): Revision of the Siobla metallica group (Hymenoptera: Tenthredinidae). Zootaxa 3196: 1-49, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280105
